sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with xu zheng 虛證 , depletion condition. Pu ji fang 普濟方 228: 治男子婦人 怯證，男子用小女兒小便 , 日進二次，乾燒餅壓之。婦人服童子小便，依 前服。月余日全效 , “For timidity conditions of men and women, men take the urine of young girls, ingest it twice a day, and press it down with dry sesame see cakes. Women ingest the urine of boys, the intake is the same as the one just outlined. In a little longer than one month this will be completely cured”.
